name: Connection.
description:
⛓ Connect the balls of the same color.

⏳ Be rapid to create combos and gain an high score.

🔴 When enough red balls have been joined together, you advance to the next level.

❌ Don't let the number of balls on the screen be greater then the background number limit!

If you have any issue, try a different browser or download the apk version.
